EmailTemplate.name: Booking Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Units__c.Name} from #FleetToGo {!FleetToGo__c.Name} for customer {!Units__c.Customer_Name__c} has been rejected by booking
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User You are receiving this notification because the {!Units__c.Name} from #FleetToGo {!FleetToGo__c.Name} for customer {!Units__c.Customer_Name__c} has been rejected by booking:
Requestor: {!Units__c.LastModifiedBy} Fleet Name: {!FleetToGo__c.Fleet_Name__c}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing
